quagga.input.clean_body:
______________________________________________________________________________
___

The vision is coming into focus and it has a new name=01(Resolution Center!
Now, it has one number=01(853.1411!

Enron Net Works Resolution Center understands in this day and age, you have
enough numbers to remember: cell phones, pagers, fax machines, etc.  So, we
are simplifying your life when it comes to contacting the Resolution Center
for IT support.  Now you have one easy number to remember =01) 853.1411.  And
more than just being easier to remember, this change will allow us to better
maximize our resources to ensure consistent, high quality service to all our
customers.

Effective Tuesday, September 5, 2000, all you have to remember is 3.1411. 
You will reach the same friendly staff you did with the previous numbers. 
Come meet some of the members of the Resolution Center team at our booth in
the Enron building lobby between 11:00 a.m. and 1:00 p.m. on Tuesday,
September 5th.  We hope to see you there!

To get more information about our new services, check online at 
http://itcentral.enron.com.
